experiences.title: Orca Security Software Engineer
experiences.heading: Building an API Security unified solution for the cloud environments.
experiences.description: Currently researching discovering and providing security to Web Assets and APIs at scale. Providing complete coverage of AWS, GCP and Azure environments.

experiences.title: RapidSec FullStack Developer
experiences.heading: Building a comprehensive CSP and client-side web security solution.
experiences.description: Developing dynamic security scanners and extensions for web apps. Probing cookies, response headers amd Client Side Security Policies (CSPs) to provide and improve their comprehensive security posture score.

experiences.title: Major League Hacking (MLH) Fellowship
experiences.heading: Released 2 major features to Jest project under Facebook.
experiences.description: Redesigned and implemented a parallelized cross-worker thread communication system for jest-core resulting in a 300x speedup over the previous non-parallel architecture.

experiences.title: Vicara Software Engineer Intern
experiences.heading: Designed and co-implemented a cloud-native microservice library
experiences.description: Designed an Identity and Access Management (IAM) system and a stress testing workbench - resulting in smooth onboarding for Samsung and Xiaomi as customers.

experiences.title: CamCann Data Science Lead
experiences.heading: Delivering Computer Vision solutions on digital advertising.
experiences.description: Lead a team of 4 people to develop a Digital Makeup Assitant utilizing SSD with MobilenetV1 for object detection in TensorFlow and training a custom CNN model.

blogs.heading: Building a multiplayer game using WebSockets - Part 1

blogs.heading: Game Design Using Socket.io and Deployments on Scale - Part 2
blogs.description: A deep dive into building multiplayer browser games using socket.io using NodeJS and React. And Deploying your application on Scale using Nginx and Clusters

blogs.description: The MLH Fellowship is an internship alternative for software engineers, with a focus on Open Source projects. Instead of working on a project for just one company, students contribute to Open Source projects that are used by companies around the world.

contact.description: Are you looking for a developer who hustles hard but stays humble? A curious soul who bobs her head to any music? An FPS gamer who plays Valorant? A foodie who will venture out for amazing cuisine with you? ‚ú® If so, do get in touch!
